title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.25 - Issuance of permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.25 - Issuance of permits

State Regulations
(a) Permits and renewals thereof are hereby
authorized to be issued granting access to and on the reservoir area. Such
permits shall be of three general classes: noncommercial, commercial and
special. (b) An applicant for a
commercial or a special permit must own private land fronting or adjoining the
proposed permit area. This provision shall not apply to certain special permits
which the board may choose to issue to local government boards, religious, fraternal and charitable organizations or associations or similar organizations
or associations. No permit shall be issued except to a person owning real
property within the delineated area. Maps of the delineated area are on file in
the Albany and Northville offices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
